setup.title: Setup
setup.description: Select an XML file containing data from your previous business period. It should end with "result", e.g.: "179_7_result.xml"
setup.selectXmlButton_error: The file must be of type .xml!
setup.xmlAlertDanger: The XML file could not be loaded. Please make sure its name ends with "...result.xml" and it contains the required data.
setup.xmlAlertSuccess: The XML file was successfully loaded into the system.
setup.msgNextPage: Your data has been saved in the system. Click the button below to go to the next page, or select an option from the sidebar.

homepage.title: Welcome to
homepage.description: Your platform for intelligent production planning.
